urls.context: Official Website Homepage. Confirms identity, contact details for Manjunath Kallapur, and serves as the entry point for all fund details, team, and portfolio information.
Inferred Official Website Team/People page. Essential for identifying all GPs, Partners, and key management staff beyond Manjunath Kallapur, including their bios and backgrounds.
Inferred Official Website Portfolio page. Crucial for confirming the 78+ investments, listing portfolio companies, and potentially detailing recent deals or exits.
Inferred Official Website Strategy/Funds page. Expected to contain explicit details regarding Ascent India Fund III and Fund V, investment thesis, sector focus, and typical deal size ($15M-$20M).
LinkedIn Company Page. Provides employee listings, corroborates the role of Manjunath Kallapur (Director - Finance), and offers potential links to individual partner profiles.
Daya General Hospital announcement of 150 Crore equity investment from Ascent Capital (Latest Investment Deal).
Legal news coverage of the 150 Crore investment by Ascent Growth Trust (Ascent Capital) in Daya General Hospital.
News detailing FreshToHome's $104M Series D funding round, where Ascent Capital participated (Follow-on deal).
News detailing The Good Glamm Group's $150M Series D funding, noting Ascent Capital's participation (Follow-on deal).
Business Standard article announcing the $350M final close for Ascent India Fund III.
Private Equity International report on Ascent Capital closing $350M Fund III.
News on Ascent India Fund IV ($240M) nearing final close/target size.
VCCircle report on Ascent Capital securing a new Limited Partner commitment for its $240M PE fund (Fund IV).
